title: These Are Keyboards You NEED To Know About!
description: Are many gaming keyboard companies ripping us off?  That's the question we asked ourselves during Computex 2019 where companies like Varmilo, Leopold, Wooting and Ducky were busy putting their "gaming" competition to shame.  We wanted to make a video dedicated just to them since these are honestly some of the best and most unique keyboards around.    Learn more about the companies in this video:  Ducky:   Varmilo:   Leopold:    A special thanks to Steelseries and Phanteks for sponsoring our trip to Computex 2019.    Subscribe    Our Computex 2019 coverage is sponsored by Phanteks and Steelseries. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #duckykeyboards #bestkeyboard #computex2019 #hardwarecanucks
